name: BizTalk360
overview:
BizTalk360 is the world’s first web based production support/monitoring tool for Microsoft BizTalk Server. It addresses various challenges organisations face once their BizTalk application gets to production.

The goal of BizTalk360 is to address the common challenges and make sure BizTalk applications can be supported by non-BizTalk people as much as possible. Some of the core capabilities

Fine grained authorization:Users can set authorization at very fine level, examples: restrict to certain applications, read-only access etc

Graphical message flow:The end-to-end message flow within BizTalk environment can be graphically visualized. This allow even non-BizTalk person to understand how a message travelled from A to B

Governance and auditing:All the key activities are audited. Ex: Starting/Stopping host instances, send ports, receive locations, orchestrations etc

Monitoring and alerting: Can monitor Applications, drives, SQL Jobs, host instances, web end points, service instances etc and notifiy via email/sms

Dynamic Topology:You can view your environment network topology diagram in real time

Advanced event viewer:Allows users to query all the event viewers across all the BizTalk/SQL servers from a single location

Throttling analyser:Abstracts the complexity behind BizTalk throttling mechanism, and provides an easy to understand graphical representation

Integrated Knowledgebase:User can attach custom knowledge base article in various places like event viewer event ids, service instances error code etc

BAM Portal:Integrated BAM portal allows users to view BAM activity/view data within a single UI

Multiple Environment Management:Securely access multiple BizTalk environments from a single URL

In addition to the above mentioned key capabilities there are still various other capabilities in the product like custom SQL query, SQL dashboard, monitoring dashboard, tracking manager, message box viewer integration, service window visualizer, Backup/DR visualizer etc
